Repository of colleges and higher education institutions

repository_metadata.notes:
REVIS offers deposit and preservation of different electronic documents. Compatibility with OpenAIRE guidelines enables sharing content with other repositories and compliance with the provisions of the European Commission on open access to peer-reviewed scientific publications and corresponding research data from publicly funded projects under the FP7 and Horizon 2020 Framework Programmes, as well as the requirements of Slovenian national strategy, institutional policies and financers.

During the deposit into the Repository each document can be submitted for the detection of the similarity of its content (plagiarism) to all contents on the national open science portal.

Metadata about masters and doctoral works will also be included into the DART-Europe portal of electronic research theses, held in European repositories.

A  college or standalone higher education institution can become a member of REVIS on the basis of mutual agreement i.e. contract.
